actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a potential resource development.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of the following potential water resource development: Seward Project, Logan and Oklahoma Counties, Oklahoma.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to engage in a feasibility investigation of a potential resource development.
